title: Largo Reveals the Ami Ami no Mi
description: Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates reveals he has eaten the Ami Ami no Mi, a Devil Fruit that grants him the ability to produce nets from his body. He demonstrates this power by creating sticky nets with a claimed '120% success rate' for capturing anything.
significance: First appearance and revelation of the Ami Ami no Mi Devil Fruit in the One Piece series. This anime-only Devil Fruit showcases unique abilities including material absorption and net transformation.

quotes.text: I have eaten the Ami Ami no Mi! My nets have a 120% success rate!
quotes.speaker: Largo
quotes.context: Largo reveals his Devil Fruit powers to the Straw Hats

title: Zoro and Sanji Trapped in Largo's Nets
description: Zoro and Sanji attempt to attack Largo but are captured by his net abilities. Despite their strength and combat skills, both fighters become ensnared in Largo's sticky, high-tensile-strength nets, leaving the Straw Hats' main fighters temporarily incapacitated.
significance: Demonstrates the effectiveness of Largo's Devil Fruit powers against formidable opponents, creating a crisis situation for the Straw Hat crew.

title: Largo's Material-Enhanced Net Abilities
description: Largo demonstrates advanced applications of his Ami Ami no Mi by ingesting various materials including metal, boiling water, and fire. His nets take on the properties of ingested materials, creating iron nets, flaming nets, and other specialized variations for different combat situations.
significance: Reveals the versatility and danger of the Ami Ami no Mi, showing it's not just a simple net-creation ability but has transformative properties based on material consumption.

title: Boss Attempts to Surrender
description: Boss the giant beetle attempts to surrender himself to the Amigo Pirates to spare the villagers of Little East Blue from harm. This selfless act demonstrates Boss's protective nature toward the people who have cared for him, particularly Yoko.
significance: Character development moment showing Boss's loyalty and willingness to sacrifice himself, establishing the emotional stakes of the conflict.

title: Luffy Intervenes to Protect Boss
description: Luffy refuses to let Boss surrender and intervenes, declaring his intention to protect both Boss and Little East Blue. Despite being at a disadvantage with his crewmates trapped, Luffy stands firm against the Amigo Pirates.
significance: Demonstrates Luffy's core character trait of protecting his friends and those he cares about, regardless of the odds. This moment reinforces why the villagers begin to trust pirates despite Yoko's initial prejudice.

quotes.text: I won't let you take Boss!
quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy declares his protection of Boss against the Amigo Pirates

title: Boss's Premature Molting Transformation
description: Boss's skin suddenly begins to shed in a molting transformation, despite it being too soon for this natural process. He emerges with a new teal color, larger size, light green fur, and enhanced tusks. The transformation temporarily grants him increased power but leaves him weakened afterward.
significance: Reveals Boss's unique biological ability to molt and transform, increasing his power level. This premature transformation becomes crucial for the rescue but comes at a cost to Boss's health.

title: Boss Breathes Fire to Free the Straw Hats
description: In his newly transformed state, Boss emits fire from his horn to burn away Largo's nets, successfully freeing Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji. However, the exertion proves too much for his premature transformation, and Boss begins to collapse from the strain.
significance: First demonstration of Boss's fire-breathing ability, which becomes the key to breaking Largo's supposedly unbreakable nets. The rescue comes at great personal cost to Boss.

title: Boss Collapses After Transformation
description: After freeing the Straw Hats with his fire breath, Boss begins to fall as the premature molting takes its toll on his body. The transformation was too soon for his body to handle, leaving him vulnerable despite his temporary power increase.
significance: Sets up the cliffhanger for the next episode and establishes the stakes - while Boss saved the Straw Hats, he's now in danger himself, requiring them to protect him while he recovers.
